name: Quorum Network Resources Ltd
description:
Founders, Charles Scott and Andrew Watson opened Quorum in 1999. We are an IT Consultancy and Managed Services company headquartered in Edinburgh with offices in London and Brighton.
Quorum began delivering large-scale deployments of e-commerce systems for world-leading banks. Weâ€™ve since developed our teams, deepened our knowledge and added to our experience. We have successful Enterprise Consulting, Managed Services, and Application Development teams, underpinned by a strong PMO function to oversee and deliver all of our projects successfully.
Our mission has always been to deliver high quality IT solutions with outstanding customer service and care for our employees. We continue to uphold the passion, teamwork, and technical specialisation which sets us apart in this industry. We became employee owned in 2019 to secure the future of the company for our customers and employees.
